name: Connect The Dots (itch) (BMasonJ14)
description:
Game created for the Make a Game, The Game Jam.

This game is about two developers from The United States and Lithuania working together to connect the dots for their game. Even though we're thousands of miles away from each other we connected and made a game. 

This was my second game jam and Orangyy's first.

The game is playable but lacks polish. I have some things that are going to keep me busy for the next few days. If I can update it I will be sure to try. Be sure to rate the game! Thanks for playing.

Art By: Orangyy

Programming By; BMasonJ13 (Me)
